channel.title: Ld on Today I Learned
channel.description: Recent content in Ld on Today I Learned

item.description: (1) that gnu ld, part of gnu’s binutils suite, is the de-facto standard interface for linker CLIs. Thus, all of gold (elf-only ld), mold/sold, and lld also try to expose ld-compatible CLIs. (2) that ld has several modes of adding a build id to an executable: --build-id[=style] [Create a ] .note.gnu.build-id ELF note section or a .buildid COFF section. The contents of the note are unique bits identifying this linked file.
